summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the supplemental or reassessment roll as authorized under Ordinance No. 59302, of Local Improvement District No. 4284, for the improvement of Columbian Way, from 9th Avenue South to Empire Way, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading, regarding, paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50922, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll.
